description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Lootfest is back for everyone who loves classic adventure games. With more monsters, weapons, missions and of course - more loot!  Explore a large world with your friends, using an easy drop-in multiplayer. Any combination of split screen and online gameplay is supported.
